message: Cannot combine AUTOINCREMENT and multiple primary keys in SQLite.
details:

CREATE TABLE wp_otgkofcs_knights ( knight_id mediumint(9) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, name_first varchar(50) NOT NULL, name_last varchar(50) NOT NULL, council_id mediumint(9), score mediumint(9), PRIMARY KEY knight_id (knight_id) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4
